reviews.review:
questo gioco rustico mi permette di assaporare il realismo delle azioni coordinate delle forze speciali, consiglio l acquisto ad ogni fan del genere poliziesco-action.
Se lo acquisterete velocemente avrete la possibilità di abusare di un glitch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y6a4Qk_AMaE vedere per credere (elementalzalka su twitch | RANK: supreme )

I have played this game for 8 years and I still play it to this day. I've laughed and cried with this game, and it's helped me to get through some low points in my life. This game will forever be a classic for me. Yes, there will be bouts of anger that you will have, but ultimately you will love this game if you're looking for a straight up shooter with with no frills.
